q: Welcome to Spiced Academy would you like to enter?

yes.q: You try and enter the front door but you try for five minutes and cannot gain access. Do you ring the bell? Call for help? or try again?

bell.q: David Answers the door, and says 'come in'. Do you choose to enter?

answers.yes: David guides you to the kitchen and tells you too look out the window. As you do, he takes the oppatunity and pushes you out the window. It was a trap. You lose
answers.no: Good Job. you should not trust that David guy!

answers.help: A class mate comes up behind you and lets you in. Congratulations, you made the encounter on time!
answers.again: Are you kidding? This door is not opening in your life time! You lose

answers.no: Dude you missed out, You gave up too early and missed your Spiced oppertunity! You lose!
